# Data process

## Cuba

### Wave 1 

#### Study-specific variables

The study-specific variable elected to be harmonised is:

* Name: `PFRDFRQ`
* Label: `frequency of seeing friends`
* Categories: 
    + `0	= no friends/ never`
    + `1	= daily`
    + `2	= 2-3 times/ week`
    + `3	= at least weekly`	
    + `4	= at least monthly`
    + `5	= less often`

* Name: `PNEIFRQ`
* Label: `frequency of seeing neighbours`
* Categories: 
    + `0	= never`
    + `1	= daily`
    + `2	= 2-3 times/ week`
    + `3	= at least weekly`	
    + `4	= at least monthly`
    + `5	= less often`
    
* Name: `PFRD`
* Label: `has friends?`
* Categories: 
    + `0 = no`
    + `1 = yes`


* Description: 
```{r assign1 cuba , echo=F}
opal.assign.table.tibble(o, 't1066_cuba_w1_cont_fr','10-66.1066-Cuba-Baseline',variables=list('PFRDFRQ','PFRD','PNEIFRQ'), missings = TRUE)
```

```{r local1 cuba , echo=F}
t1066_cuba_w1_cont_fr <- opal.execute(o,'t1066_cuba_w1_cont_fr')
vari <- t1066_cuba_w1_cont_fr$PFRDFRQ
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = NA)[2], caption = attributes(vari)$`spss::shortName`)
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = NA)[1], caption = "Category")
#Categorical_summary(var = t1066_cuba_w1_cont_fr$PFRDFRQ, missing_values = NA)
ggplot(t1066_cuba_w1_cont_fr, aes(x=factor(PFRDFRQ))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("frequency of seeing friends") + ylab("Frequency")

vari <- t1066_cuba_w1_cont_fr$PNEIFRQ
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = NA)[2], caption = attributes(vari)$`spss::shortName`)
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = NA)[1], caption = "Category")
#Categorical_summary(var = t1066_cuba_w1_cont_fr$PNEIFRQ, missing_values = NA)
ggplot(t1066_cuba_w1_cont_fr, aes(x=factor(PNEIFRQ))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("frequency of seeing neighbours") + ylab("Frequency")

vari <- t1066_cuba_w1_cont_fr$PFRD
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = NA)[2], caption = attributes(vari)$`spss::shortName`)
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = NA)[1], caption = "Category")
#Categorical_summary(var = t1066_cuba_w1_cont_fr$PFRD, missing_values = NA)
ggplot(t1066_cuba_w1_cont_fr, aes(x=factor(PFRD))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("has friends?") + ylab("Frequency")
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm
To compute the harmonize variable from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `(PFRDFRQ in (0,5) OR PFRD=0) AND PNEIFRQ in (0,5) into 0`
* `PFRDFRQ in (1,2,3,4) OR PNEIFRQ in (1,2,3,4) into 1`
* `NA into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo1 cuba , echo=TRUE}
t1066_ds_cuba_w1 <- tibble(id=t1066_cuba_w1_cont_fr$id)

t1066_cuba_w1_cont_fr$PFRD <- car::recode(as.vector(t1066_cuba_w1_cont_fr$PFRD), "NA='-999'")
t1066_cuba_w1_cont_fr$PFRDFRQ <- car::recode(as.vector(t1066_cuba_w1_cont_fr$PFRDFRQ), "NA='-999'")
t1066_cuba_w1_cont_fr$PNEIFRQ <- car::recode(as.vector(t1066_cuba_w1_cont_fr$PNEIFRQ), "NA='-999'")



t1066_ds_cuba_w1$cont_fr <- c(NA)  
for(i in 1:dim(t1066_cuba_w1_cont_fr)[1]){
  if( (t1066_cuba_w1_cont_fr$PFRDFRQ[i] %in% c(0,5) | t1066_cuba_w1_cont_fr$PFRD[i] == 0 ) & t1066_cuba_w1_cont_fr$PNEIFRQ[i] %in% c(0,5) ) { 
    t1066_ds_cuba_w1$cont_fr[i] = 0 }
  else if(t1066_cuba_w1_cont_fr$PFRDFRQ[i] %in% c(1,2,3,4) | t1066_cuba_w1_cont_fr$PNEIFRQ[i] %in% c(1,2,3,4) ){ 
    t1066_ds_cuba_w1$cont_fr[i] = 1 }
  else if( t1066_cuba_w1_cont_fr$PFRD[i] == 0 ){ 
    t1066_ds_cuba_w1$cont_fr[i] = 0 }
}
t1066_ds_cuba_w1$cont_fr <- car::recode(as.vector(t1066_ds_cuba_w1$cont_fr), "NA='999'")
t1066_ds_cuba_w1$cont_fr <- labelled(t1066_ds_cuba_w1$cont_fr, labels = c("No"=0, "Yes"=1, "Missing"=999, "Do not know"=998, "Refuse"=997, "Not applicable"=996, "Don't answer"=995,  "Not attempt/not done/not yet recorded"=994, "Disable to measure"=993, "Impute"=992, "CAPI/interviewer error"=991))
```

#### Statistical description of the new harmonised variable
```{r descript1 cuba , echo=F}
vari <- t1066_ds_cuba_w1$cont_fr
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[3]) 
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[1], caption = "Category")
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[2], caption = "Type of missing")
#Categorical_summary(var = t1066_ds_cuba_w1$cont_fr, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))
ggplot(t1066_ds_cuba_w1, aes(x=factor(cont_fr))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("Are the contacts with friends/neighbours frequent") + ylab("Frequency")
```

#### Validation
```{r crosstabulation1 cuba , echo=F}

```

#### Harmonisation algorithm
To compute the harmonize variable from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `(PFRDFRQ in (0,5) OR PFRD=0) AND PNEIFRQ in (0,5) into 0`
* `PFRDFRQ in (1,2,3,4) OR PNEIFRQ in (1,2,3,4) into 1`
* `NA into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo1 UM, echo=TRUE}
t1066_ds_UM_w1 <- tibble(id=t1066_UM_w1_cont_fr$id)

t1066_UM_w1_cont_fr$PFRD <- car::recode(as.vector(t1066_UM_w1_cont_fr$PFRD), "NA='-999'")
t1066_UM_w1_cont_fr$PFRDFRQ <- car::recode(as.vector(t1066_UM_w1_cont_fr$PFRDFRQ), "NA='-999'")
t1066_UM_w1_cont_fr$PNEIFRQ <- car::recode(as.vector(t1066_UM_w1_cont_fr$PNEIFRQ), "NA='-999'")

t1066_ds_UM_w1$cont_fr <- c(NA)  
for(i in 1:dim(t1066_UM_w1_cont_fr)[1]){
  if( ( t1066_UM_w1_cont_fr$PFRDFRQ[i] %in% c(0,5) | t1066_UM_w1_cont_fr$PFRD[i] == 0 ) & t1066_UM_w1_cont_fr$PNEIFRQ[i] %in% c(0,5) ) { 
    t1066_ds_UM_w1$cont_fr[i] = 0 }
  else if(t1066_UM_w1_cont_fr$PFRDFRQ[i] %in% c(1,2,3,4) | t1066_UM_w1_cont_fr$PNEIFRQ[i] %in% c(1,2,3,4) ){ 
    t1066_ds_UM_w1$cont_fr[i] = 1 }
  else if( t1066_UM_w1_cont_fr$PFRD[i] == 0 ){ 
    t1066_ds_UM_w1$cont_fr[i] = 0 }
}
t1066_ds_UM_w1$cont_fr <- car::recode(as.vector(t1066_ds_UM_w1$cont_fr), "NA='999'")
t1066_ds_UM_w1$cont_fr <- labelled(t1066_ds_UM_w1$cont_fr, labels = c("No"=0, "Yes"=1, "Missing"=999, "Do not know"=998, "Refuse"=997, "Not applicable"=996, "Don't answer"=995,  "Not attempt/not done/not yet recorded"=994, "Disable to measure"=993, "Impute"=992, "CAPI/interviewer error"=991 ))
```

## Venezuela

### Wave 1  

#### Study-specific variables


* Name: `PFRDFRQ`
* Label: `frequency of seeing friends`
* Categories: 
    + `0	= no friends/ never`
    + `1	= daily`
    + `2	= 2-3 times/ week`
    + `3	= at least weekly`	
    + `4	= at least monthly`
    + `5	= less often`

* Name: `PNEIFRQ`
* Label: `frequency of seeing neighbours`
* Categories: 
    + `0	= never`
    + `1	= daily`
    + `2	= 2-3 times/ week`
    + `3	= at least weekly`	
    + `4	= at least monthly`
    + `5	= less often`
    
* Name: `PFRD`
* Label: `has friends?`
* Categories: 
    + `0 = no`
    + `1 = yes`


* Description: 
```{r assign1 Ven, echo=F}
opal.assign.table.tibble(o, 't1066_Ven_w1_cont_fr','10-66.1066-Venezuela-Baseline',variables=list('PFRDFRQ','PFRD','PNEIFRQ'), missings = TRUE)
```


#### Harmonisation algorithm
To compute the harmonize variable from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `(PFRDFRQ in (0,5) OR PFRD=0) AND PNEIFRQ in (0,5) into 0`
* `PFRDFRQ in (1,2,3,4) OR PNEIFRQ in (1,2,3,4) into 1`
* `NA into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo1 Ven, echo=TRUE}

t1066_Ven_w1_cont_fr$PFRD <- car::recode(as.vector(t1066_Ven_w1_cont_fr$PFRD), "NA='-999'")
t1066_Ven_w1_cont_fr$PFRDFRQ <- car::recode(as.vector(t1066_Ven_w1_cont_fr$PFRDFRQ), "NA='-999'")
t1066_Ven_w1_cont_fr$PNEIFRQ <- car::recode(as.vector(t1066_Ven_w1_cont_fr$PNEIFRQ), "NA='-999'")

t1066_ds_Ven_w1$cont_fr <- c(NA)  
for(i in 1:dim(t1066_Ven_w1_cont_fr)[1]){
  if( ( t1066_Ven_w1_cont_fr$PFRDFRQ[i] %in% c(0,5) | t1066_Ven_w1_cont_fr$PFRD[i] == 0 ) & t1066_Ven_w1_cont_fr$PNEIFRQ[i] %in% c(0,5) ) { 
    t1066_ds_Ven_w1$cont_fr[i] = 0 }
  else if(t1066_Ven_w1_cont_fr$PFRDFRQ[i] %in% c(1,2,3,4) | t1066_Ven_w1_cont_fr$PNEIFRQ[i] %in% c(1,2,3,4) ){ 
    t1066_ds_Ven_w1$cont_fr[i] = 1 }
  else if( t1066_Ven_w1_cont_fr$PFRD[i] == 0 ){ 
    t1066_ds_Ven_w1$cont_fr[i] = 0 }
  }
t1066_ds_Ven_w1$cont_fr <- car::recode(as.vector(t1066_ds_Ven_w1$cont_fr), "NA='999'")
t1066_ds_Ven_w1$cont_fr <- labelled(t1066_ds_Ven_w1$cont_fr, labels = c("No"=0, "Yes"=1, "Missing"=999, "Do not know"=998, "Refuse"=997, "Not applicable"=996, "Don't answer"=995,  "Not attempt/not done/not yet recorded"=994, "Disable to measure"=993, "Impute"=992, "CAPI/interviewer error"=991 ))
```
